thread.title: No fun: Collier Fair closed today because of storms, reopens Saturday
thread.title_full: No fun: Collier Fair closed today because of storms, reopens Saturday

author: , Naples Daily News
title: No fun: Collier Fair closed today because of storms, reopens Saturday
text:
No fun: Collier Fair closed today because of storms, reopening Saturday Dave Osborn Naples Daily News No fair food or fun rides but only for a day.
The Collier Fair announced late Friday morning that the fair will be closed for a day because of bad weather, "including the threat of flooding, thunderstorms, and damaging wind."
"The safety of our patrons, vendors, and staff is our utmost priority, and we believe it is in everyone's best interest to remain closed for the day," the fair announced on Facebook .
"However, we are pleased to inform our valued attendees that the closure is for today only. We are eager to welcome everyone back tomorrow, Saturday, March 23, for an exciting day filled with festivities as we present 'Super Saturday' sponsored by Antojitos."
The Collier Fair also said what people can expect Saturday:
Adult Admission: $15 until 5 p.m. Child Admission: $5 until 5 p.m. Admission after 5 p.m. is $20 per person Ride Armbands: $40
Livestock shows 3 p.m.: Goat & Pee Wee Show and Showmanship 7 p.m.: Rabbit & Cavy Show & Showmanship "We apologize for any inconvenience caused by today's closure and appreciate your understanding," the fair continued on Facebook. "Thank you for your continued support, and we look forward to seeing you tomorrow for Super Saturday!
For more information and updates, visit www.collierfair.com or contact us at 239-455-1444.
